SQLList.Command: SELECT TOP 100 Name AS IID, Name AS DDISPLAY FROM dbo.WorkShifts WHERE Name like @filter

SELECT TOP 100 WorkShiftIntervals.Name AS IID, WorkShiftIntervals.Name + ' (' + WorkShifts.Name + ')' AS DDISPLAY FROM WorkShiftIntervals INNER JOIN WorkShifts ON WorkShiftIntervals.WorkShiftId = WorkShifts.[Id] WHERE (WorkShiftIntervals.Name + ' (' + WorkShifts.Name + ')' like @filter) AND (WorkShifts.Name = @filter1 OR @filter1 = '-1')
SELECT TOP 100 IID, DDISPLAY FROM SelectList_ProductionLines WHERE DDISPLAY LIKE @filter AND ((DDISPLAY LIKE '%'+@filter1+'%') OR (@filter1 = '-1') OR (@filter1 = ''))
select [QuotedKeylist] AS IID, [Word]+' ('+[Keylist]+')' AS DDISPLAY from [dbo].[QueryView_ProductionLineLists] order by [Word]
SELECT TOP 100 IID, DDISPLAY FROM SelectList_ProductionLines WHERE DDISPLAY LIKE @filter AND (@filter1 LIKE '%'''+IID+'''%' OR (@filter1 = '-1') OR (@filter1 = ''))
SELECT TOP 100 IID, DDISPLAY FROM SelectList_WorkPlaces WHERE DDISPLAY LIKE @filter AND (DDISPLAY LIKE '%'+@filter1+'%' AND (NOT @filter1 = '-1') AND (NOT @filter1 = ''))

EnumItem.Display: Package closed

SQLList.Command: SELECT DISTINCT [DTMPeriods].[PeriodeType] AS IID, dbo.PeriodTypeName([DTMPeriods].[PeriodeType], 'hu_HU') AS DDISPLAY FROM [dbo].[DTMPeriods]

SELECT AndonRequestCodes.[Code] AS IID ,AndonRequestCodes.[Description] ,AndonRequestCodes.[Active] ,i18nWords.WordDescription ,i18nTranslations.Text +' (' + AndonRequestCodes.[Code] + ')' AS DDISPLAY FROM dbo.AndonRequestCodes INNER JOIN dbo.i18nWords ON AndonRequestCodes.[Description] = i18nWords.WordCode INNER JOIN dbo.i18nTranslations ON i18nWords.[WordCode] = i18nTranslations.Word_WordCode WHERE (AndonRequestCodes.Active = 1) AND (i18nTranslations.Language_LanguageCode = 'hu-HU')

SELECT AndonHelpCodes.[Code] AS IID ,AndonHelpCodes.[Description] ,AndonHelpCodes.[Active] ,i18nWords.WordDescription ,i18nTranslations.Text +' (' + AndonHelpCodes.[Code] + ')' AS DDISPLAY FROM dbo.AndonHelpCodes INNER JOIN dbo.i18nWords ON AndonHelpCodes.[Description] = i18nWords.WordCode INNER JOIN dbo.i18nTranslations ON i18nWords.[WordCode] = i18nTranslations.Word_WordCode WHERE (AndonHelpCodes.Active = 1) AND (i18nTranslations.Language_LanguageCode = 'hu-HU')

EnumItem.Display: Passzív
Aktív

SQLList.Command: SELECT DISTINCT [DTMPeriods].[PeriodeType] AS IID, dbo.PeriodTypeName([DTMPeriods].[PeriodeType], 'en_US') AS DDISPLAY FROM [dbo].[DTMPeriods]

SELECT AndonRequestCodes.[Code] AS IID ,AndonRequestCodes.[Description] ,AndonRequestCodes.[Active] ,i18nWords.WordDescription ,i18nTranslations.Text +' (' + AndonRequestCodes.[Code] + ')' AS DDISPLAY FROM dbo.AndonRequestCodes INNER JOIN dbo.i18nWords ON AndonRequestCodes.[Description] = i18nWords.WordCode INNER JOIN dbo.i18nTranslations ON i18nWords.[WordCode] = i18nTranslations.Word_WordCode WHERE (AndonRequestCodes.Active = 1) AND (i18nTranslations.Language_LanguageCode = 'en-US')

SELECT AndonHelpCodes.[Code] AS IID ,AndonHelpCodes.[Description] ,AndonHelpCodes.[Active] ,i18nWords.WordDescription ,i18nTranslations.Text +' (' + AndonHelpCodes.[Code] + ')' AS DDISPLAY FROM dbo.AndonHelpCodes INNER JOIN dbo.i18nWords ON AndonHelpCodes.[Description] = i18nWords.WordCode INNER JOIN dbo.i18nTranslations ON i18nWords.[WordCode] = i18nTranslations.Word_WordCode WHERE (AndonHelpCodes.Active = 1) AND (i18nTranslations.Language_LanguageCode = 'en-US')
